overview: Sometimes you will pay any price to get what you want. And the price for a woman to become a diva can be astronomical. Velvet Rose is about to pay the ultimate price to make her dreams come true. All she has to do is sell her soul to the devil and everything she could ever imagine becomes reality into a decadent pool of lust she soon finds herself as the darklord resides over a pleasure pit of sin and perversion. But dreams can come true.
tagline: Are you ready to pay the ultimate price...
title: Black Divas
